response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled quality, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. We believe it's worth more than its face value, reflecting the time, effort, and innovation invested into its creation. Considering all these factors, we're offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you're interested in securing this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 15000}
